transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir, good morning.
Customer: Ji ji, good morning.
Executive: Main keh raha tha woh abhi na aapke yahan kisi ne video meeting ki request open kari hai. Toh aapne ki hai sir woh?
Customer: Mere yahan se video meeting?
Executive: Haan, video meeting karne ke liye.
Customer: Kis cheez mein?
Executive: IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun, Hanuman.
Customer: Nahi nahi, kis cheez ke liye video meeting?
Executive: Matlab ek udhar pe screen pe na ek video meeting ka option aata hai. Ki aap video meeting karna chah rahe hain, toh usi pe kisi ne click kiya hai.
Customer: Ya toh main ek baar unse baat kar loon, ho sakta hai unhone.
Executive: Ek baar pehle unse, khali woh aur main dono mein se koi teesra aur nahi karega kuch.
Customer: Theek hai, main ek baar baat. Ek baar unse pooch lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, baki aapka woh refund wala okay ho gaya hai idhar se.
Customer: Theek hai na koi.
Executive: Toh woh aapke paas do teen din mein receive hoga, toh main bata dunga aapko jaise.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about a video meeting request.

- Refund status.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund is approved.

- Executive will inform once refund is processed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, refund, status
